mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(lecrum_use_no) cnt
SELECT COUNT(req_no) cnt
FROM ${tb_name} WHERE process_stat = (SELECT com_code FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = (SELECT code_grp FROM tb_code_grp WHERE code_grp_nm = 'PROCESS_STAT') AND com_code_nm = '대기' )
AND use_tb_code = (SELECT com_code FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = (SELECT code_grp FROM tb_code_grp WHERE code_grp_nm = 'USE_TB_CODE') AND com_code_nm = '대관신청' )
AND staff_no = #{staff_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT p_bo_no, rn, cng_req_no, stdnt_no, stdnt_name, sub_name, req_de, process_stat, proc_date, refuse_resn, atch_file_no, req_cl_code, com_code_nm req_cl_name, req_resn_code, cng_bgnde, cng_endde FROM (SELECT (SELECT COUNT(cng_req_no) FROM reginfo_cng) - (ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY req_de DESC, PROC_DATE DESC)) + 1 p_bo_no, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY req_de DESC, PROC_DATE DESC) rn, cng_req_no, a.stdnt_no, b.name stdnt_name, c.sub_name, req_de, process_stat, proc_date, refuse_resn, atch_file_no, req_cl_code, req_resn_code, cng_bgnde, cng_endde FROM reginfo_cng a INNER JOIN student b ON(a.stdnt_no = b.stdnt_no) INNER JOIN subject c ON(b.sub_code = c.sub_code) ) a INNER JOIN tb_com_code b ON(a.req_cl_code = b.com_code)
WHERE rn <= 5
AND b.code_grp = (SELECT code_grp FROM tb_code_grp WHERE code_grp_nm = 'REQ_CL_CODE')

SELECT a.scre_no, a.stdnt_no, b.lec_code, b.lec_name, b.name, b.lec_cl_nm, b.lec_pnt, (mid_scre * midterm + final_scre * finals + attend_scre * attend + task_scre * task + etc_scre * etc) total, a.pnt_rank_nm, a.year, a.semstr FROM lec_scre a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.lec_code, b.lec_name, c.name, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE code_grp = 'G06' AND a.lec_cl = com_code) lec_cl_nm, b.lec_pnt, NVL(d.midterm, 0.4) midterm, NVL(d.finals, 0.4) finals, NVL(d.attend, 0.2) attend, NVL(d.task, 0) task, NVL(d.etc, 0) etc FROM lecture a INNER JOIN curriculum b ON(a.cur_code = b.cur_code) INNER JOIN staff c ON(b.staff_no = c.staff_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN lec_score_st d ON (a.lec_code = d.lec_code) )b ON(a.lec_code = b.lec_code) WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no}
SELECT SUM(c.lec_pnt) totalCredit FROM lec_scre a INNER JOIN lecture l ON a.lec_code = l.lec_code INNER JOIN curriculum c ON l.cur_code = c.cur_code WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(b.pnt_val), 2) totalPntVal FROM lec_scre a LEFT OUTER JOIN pnt_rank b ON a.pnt_rank_nm = b.pnt_rank_nm WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no}

SELECT AVG(mid_scre * NVL(d.midterm, 0.4) + final_scre * NVL(d.finals, 0.4) + attend_scre * NVL(d.attend, 0.2) + task_scre * NVL(d.task, 0) + etc_scre * NVL(d.etc, 0)) totalAvg FROM lec_scre a INNER JOIN lecture l ON a.lec_code = l.lec_code LEFT OUTER JOIN lec_score_st d ON a.lec_code = d.lec_code WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no}
